channel.title: Neeeed help plsss
channel.description: so i was successful in starting up a server but then i wanted to change owener ship so i went to character in file but the file was not readable. it said i needed some other program to read the file (.P) and I believe i changed the file type or something an made it worse :/

item.title: Neeeed help plsss
item.dc:creator: @RS_From_The_00s RS From The 00s
item.description:
@RS_From_The_00s wrote:

Yeah, don’t change the extension and expect it to work. It can only be read by the application that created it. In your login/initialise method (where it says “Welcome to RuneScape.”), add a statement that checks for your name and setRights == 2, i.e.

if (player.userName().equalsIgnoreCase("vonmister")) {
        player.getRights() == Rights.ADMINISTRATOR;
}

The methods will of course be different in your source.

Read full topic
